pros:
- latest technologies used - AWS, NodeJS, Terraform, Serverless, etc
- done both backend & devops
- learning a lot
- best colleagues
- great compensations & benefits
cons: - some people are lazy & working only for paycheck

review_title: Great place to learn and grow
pros:
- A lot of cloud technologies
- A lot of freedom in choosing technologies/ trying out new things
- excellent benefits and work life balance: 2 weeks off for Christmas, all legal holidays that happen to be on weekends are compensated with a free Monday/ Friday
cons: - you are using cool technologies but it sometimes feels like it's overkill

pros: Great benefits, great colleagues, nice projects and technologies
cons: Nothing to add in this section

pros: Flexible hours, full remote work since the beginning of the pandemics, good work-life balance
cons: Occasional miscommunication, sometimes resistant to change

review_title: Great products but not a destination workplace
pros:
Great products created here
A good place to learn and grow
cons:
Administration only wants to cut spendings by doing absurd things like buying the lowest quality products, postponing agreed salary increases, canceling business trips in the last moment because the flight is cheaper later etc
No respect for regular employees, lot of talks behind close doors, low transparency
